metadata.description: Email to send all notification for MOC Registration(Operations) expiration
Provides current environment base url. No back slash ending.

parameters.$filter: (ovs_mocregistrationname ne null and ovs_registrationexpiry ne null and (Microsoft.Dynamics.CRM.On(PropertyName='ovs_registrationexpiry',PropertyValue='@{formatDateTime(addDays(utcnow(),-30),'yyyy-MM-dd')}')) and _ovs_siteid_value ne null) and (ovs_SiteId/_parentaccountid_value ne null)

MessageText.inputs:
Hello/Bonjour,

Operation @{items('Iterate_expired_-_single_thread')?['ovs_name']} expired 30 days ago.

Please use the following link to navigate directly to the operation:
Operation @{items('Iterate_expired_-_single_thread')?['ovs_name']}
___________________________________________________________________________________

Opération @{items('Iterate_expired_-_single_thread')?['ovs_name']} a expiré il y a 30 jours.

Veuillez utiliser le lien suivant pour accéder directement à l’opération:
Operation @{items('Iterate_expired_-_single_thread')?['ovs_name']}

parameters.emailMessage/Body:
Hello/Bonjour,

Operation @{items('Iterate_expired_-_single_thread')?['ovs_name']} expired 30 days ago.

Please use the following link to navigate directly to the operation:
Operation @{items('Iterate_expired_-_single_thread')?['ovs_name']}
___________________________________________________________________________________

Opération @{items('Iterate_expired_-_single_thread')?['ovs_name']} a expiré il y a 30 jours.

Veuillez utiliser le lien suivant pour accéder directement à l’opération:
Operation @{items('Iterate_expired_-_single_thread')?['ovs_name']}

parameters.$filter: (Microsoft.Dynamics.CRM.On(PropertyName='ovs_registrationexpiry',PropertyValue='@{formatDateTime(addDays(utcnow(),variables('InDays')),'yyyy-MM-dd')}') and ovs_SiteId/_parentaccountid_value ne null and ovs_registrationexpiry ne null and ovs_mocregistrationname ne null and fdr_registrationtype/_fdr_standard_value ne null) and (ovs_SiteId/accountid ne null) and (fdr_registrationtype/fdr_containertypeid ne null)

parameters.item/subject: Transport Canada – Expiry Notice / Transports Canada – Avis d’expiration
Transport Canada –Renewal Notice / Transports Canada – Avis de renouvellement
